title: Bold Predictions based on free agency moves, NFL facilities shutting down, Mailbag ðŸ“¬ (Football 3/26)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to discuss the news of NFL facilities shutting down and potential impact the coronavirus still has on the NFL Draft (5:30). Then, the guys discuss their biggest and boldest predictions based on moves that were made during free agency (20:00). Next, it's time for mailbag questions courtesy of 5-star reviews left on Apple Podcasts (43:30). But before that, shoutout to the 'Pardon My Take' podcast for labeling Brinson a hoarder---because he is!

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS @johnbreech, @seanjwagner
